snippet.title: Wait! Life is Beautiful! – Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/680830

W!LiB! is an interactive psychological thriller about suicides with a touch of black humor. This is a story about a void in the soul, about search and loss of the life purpose in trying to save oneself and others.

The game is also on GameJolt and Itch.io:
GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/@wlib_gn
Itch.io: https://gamenet.itch.io/wlib
